Thanks again to Jeff & Maureen of Coil Pro in Southington for sharing their story and opening their business to us this morning!
"We must send a proven jobs creator to Washington to get the job done. I look forward to seeing you during the campaign." RT! #linda2012
"In the months of hard work ahead, I must earn your vote. We can and we will fix this economy."
"You might not recognize it now, but the American dream is still alive. I know that – because I am proof."
"The last thing that we need to do right now is to raise taxes when facing the threat of a recession."
"I will work with Republicans, Democrats and Independents – because serving our country means putting people before party."
"As your senator, I will go to Washington with one objective and that is to get our state and country working again."
"Regardless of what political party you belong to, we agree that we’re going down the wrong economic track, an… (cont) http://t.co/qJPBgSJz
"I know what our families are trying to do to survive every day. I’ve been there and you never forget."
"The American dream is about opportunity and second chances.  I know a little bit about second chances myself."
"There is no reason why the largest, richest economy cannot regain its strength and create jobs for every woman and man who wants to work."
"Ladies and gentlemen, I’m a proven job creator, and today I am a candidate for the United States Senate." RT! #ctsen #linda2012
"Here we are, in the fourth year of a lifeless economy that last month didn’t add a single new job for the millions who need one."
"They are a success story and we need more of them here in Connecticut and across the country."
Jeff started Coil Pro in 1997 with one employee and four thousand square feet. Today, he has ten employees and 18 thousand square feet.
The founders and owners of Coil Pro, Jeff and his wife Maureen, tell their "American Dream" story and introduce Linda. ~Staff
